reviews.text: We loved this hotel! The woman at the front desk was extremely friendly and helpful. The location near the train station was so convienient, yet it wasn't much of a walk to the city center. The location was extremely quiet as well. The rooms were small and simple, but for the incredible price I'll take it!
reviews.title: Superb location & value

reviews.text: Pleasant service, very good balance of price and standard, great as a base for an overnight trip to Amiens, everything in easy walking distance. We booked two rooms and they were clean and quiet.
reviews.title: Good value, great location, beds a bit hard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One thing though: the beds were a bit hard, and they put a plastic protective barrier between the cotton sheet and mattress, which is a bit squeaky and sweaty.
reviews.title: Budget hotel in decent location
